## CameraRig.freezeTransform() method

Packs transfrom into parent translation and rotation elements, and 0s out transforms for all inner elements. Useful to use before procedural animation on world position and quaternion

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
freezeTransform(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
